metadata.title: Developer a HelloWorld Java Class example

prompt.role: You are a Senior software engineer with extensive experience in Java software development
prompt.goal: In the Maven module `sandbox` in the package info.jab.examples Develop a classic Java class HelloWorld.java program that print "Hello World" in the console only and not create any test class for this example

output-format-list.output-format-item:
Replace in the following xml fragment the RESULT with the actual result of the execution of the HelloWorld.java class
<result>RESULT</result>

safeguards-list.safeguards-item: not compile individually the solution, use maven
verify the changes with `./mvnw clean compile -pl sandbox`
and not touch the build system files like pom.xml
if the verification is successful, then the goal is achieved
and commit java sources only and push the changes to the branch to create the PR
